Name: LBT-6094TG Prototype 'Super' Slick Plate Carrier
Description: A custom made and highly advanced variant of the London Bridge Trading company's 'Slick' plate carrier made by the Terra Group International Military R&D Division. A prototype 'neuralink' injector near the spine can provide unique enhancements to the user's natural abilities. Only a few were produced before the Novrinsk incident.
